mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, John, 1790-1862
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Urges Gardiner to report about all aspects of his trip and findings in California and hopes that the people of California will draft a constitution by Dec. 1; describes a festive trip to Richmond to break monotony of life at "Sherwood Forest" and comments on the wheat crop. Autograph Letter Signed.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1849 April 3, John Tyler, Sherwood Forest, Virginia to Col. David L. Gardiner, Sacramento, California?
